text:
For anyone looking for somewhere to start with a boilerplate: <https://github.com/teunrutten/HubSpot-boilerplate>
It is a custom setup, so feel free to copy and change it to your own needs. It uses Gulp and Sass and comes with Preact (Small React library). If you want to use React, make sure `theme-foundation-v-1-0.min.js`doesn't get loaded.
We are still working on the readme
So not everything is covered yet
